document_data.caption: A map showing Gathgaer Milomynt's residence on Drawn Sword Alley.
document_data.name: Gathgaer Milomynt's Residence
document_data.mainbody: '''Gathgaer Milomynt's residence''' was a row house and the home of [[Gathgaer Milomynt]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The home stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: Gathgaer Milomynt's residence was located in the north section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] on the east side of [[Drawn Sword Alley]].
